name: Intellibed
0:
”Alexa, ask smart base to zero g.”
”Alexa, ask smart base to start massaging.”
”Alexa, ask smart base to go to flat.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart base
des: Control your INTELLIbed with your voice! Use voice commands to use the available motion, lighting, massage and other features of your INTELLIbed. You can raise and lower your head, elevate and lower your feet, put the bed in Zero-G for ultimate comfort, start, stop, and increase or decrease massage intensity, turn under-bed lighting on and off, and more. Ergomotion voice-enabled adjustable base required. Availability of different features depends on features installed on the base.
